role:
Security pattern role being searched 
           (e.g., verification_manager, token_generator)
query: Zoekt search query used to find the pattern
webframework:
Web framework used in the repository 
                   (e.g., fastapi, django)
pattern:
Security pattern name being detected 
              (e.g., password_based_authentication)
success:
Boolean indicating if pattern 
              implementation was found

contexts.filepath: Path to file containing the role implemented
contexts.start_line: Starting line number of code snippet
contexts.end_line: Ending line number of code snippet
contexts.snippet:
Actual code content showing pattern 
                  implementation
